1. Basic Information

Basic Information

Community Hospitals of Central California (CHCC)

EIN: 942437106

When Googling CHCC [1], the website that comes up first is “Community Medical Centers” [1] and not “Community Hospitals of Central California”.

CHCC has a sort of confusing website setup. First, they have a website called communitymedical.org [1]. This site appears to be dedicated to the 4 Fresno and Clovis medical centers (listed below). However, they have a second website called cmcenters.org [2], which has a much longer list of medical centers and administrative buildings that are primarily near Stockton. The Locations Page on the second site [2] lists all of the Stockton area locations. See the Facilities Page for a comprehensive list and map of all facilities. Also on their 2023 Form 990, they list their website as www.communitymedicalcenters.org, which redirects to the Stockton page [2]

  • Clovis Community Medical Center
    • 2755 Herndon Avenue
    • Clovis, CA 93611
    • (559) 324-4000
  • Community Regional Medical Center
    • 2823 Fresno Street
    • Fresno, CA 93721
    • (559) 459-6000
  • Fresno Heart & Surgical Hospital
    • 15 E. Audubon Drive
    • Fresno, CA 93720
    • (559) 433-8000
  • Community Behavioral Health Center
    • 7171 N. Cedar Avenue
    • Fresno, CA 93720
    • (559) 449-8000

Form 990

A viewable version of Form 990 for CHCC [1] can be seen at [3].

Below is basic information pulled from Giving Tuesday Data Commons [4]. For variable definitions see the data dictionary below Section 1.2.

Form 990 Data Dictionary

This table gives definitions for all of the variables in Section 1.1.1.

Strategy

  • CHCC [1] is a non-profit primarily based in the Stockton area, with only 4 medical centers near Fresno. It could be a point of agitation to the community of Fresno that an out-of-town organization is the one that owns their hospitals.
